acceptance_of_terms.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance_of_terms.content: By using this application, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, you must discontinue use of the App immediately.

sections.responsible_use: Users are solely responsible for their use of the App and must use it in a lawful, ethical, and responsible manner.
sections.prohibited_content: Users must not post or share any content that is offensive, adult, discriminatory, racist, illegal, or harmful. The admin reserves the right to remove such content and terminate associated accounts.
sections.account_security: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials and for any activity that occurs under their account.

sharing_of_information.title: Sharing of Information
sharing_of_information.content: By using the App, you agree that your information may be shared with third-party services to enhance the functionality and experience of the App. The admin ensures that data sharing complies with applicable legal standards.

sections.not_responsible: The admin is not responsible for any harm, damage, or loss resulting from improper use of the App, technical issues, downtime, or user interactions.
sections.indemnification: Users agree to indemnify and hold harmless the admin from any claims arising out of their use of the App.

sections.user_right: Users have the right to delete their accounts at any time. Upon deletion, personal data will be handled as described in the Appâ€™s Privacy Policy.
sections.admin_right: The admin reserves the right to suspend or permanently remove accounts that violate the rules or engage in malicious activities.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: The admin reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Continued use of the App constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

use_of_cookies.title: Use of Cookies
use_of_cookies.content: The App uses cookies to enhance the user experience, analyze app performance, and provide personalized content. By using the App, you agree to the use of cookies.

sections.essential_cookies: Necessary for the operation of the App.
sections.performance_cookies: Collect data on how users interact with the App.
sections.functionality_cookies: Save user preferences to enhance usability.
sections.third_party_cookies: May be used to deliver personalized advertising or analytics.

user_consent.title: User Consent
user_consent.content: By using the App, you consent to the storage and use of cookies as described in this policy. You may disable cookies through your device settings, but doing so may limit the functionality of the App.

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.content: The App employs industry-standard security measures to protect user data. However, the admin cannot guarantee complete security due to the inherent risks of online services.

user_responsibility.title: User Responsibility
user_responsibility.content: Users are responsible for safeguarding their login credentials and reporting any unauthorized access or suspicious activity to the admin immediately.

data_sharing.title: Data Sharing
data_sharing.content: While the App prioritizes user data security, some data may be shared with trusted third-party providers to enhance functionality or comply with legal requirements.

sections.prohibited_content: Users are not allowed to post or share content that is explicit, adult, discriminatory, racist, illegal, or incites violence or hatred.
sections.misuse_of_app: Users must not use the App for any activity that could harm its reputation, interfere with its operation, or exploit other users.
sections.consequences: The admin reserves the right to remove any content or account that violates these rules without prior notice.

account_deletion.title: Account Deletion
account_deletion.content: Users may request account deletion at any time through the Appâ€™s settings or by contacting support. Upon deletion, personal data will be removed as per the Privacy Policy, but some data may be retained for legal or regulatory purposes.

complaints.title: Complaints and Disputes
complaints.content: Users have the right to raise complaints or disputes regarding the App. Such complaints must be submitted via the official support channels.

sections.no_guarantee: The App is provided 'as-is.' The admin does not guarantee uninterrupted access, accuracy, or fitness for any specific purpose.
sections.legal_compliance: Users are responsible for ensuring their actions comply with local laws and regulations.
sections.admin_rights: The admin reserves the right to update policies, remove content, and modify App features at any time.
